code: import React from'react';import{Star,Quote}from'lucide-react';import'./Testimonials.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Testimonials=()=>{const testimonials=[{quote:"Revolv helped me take my local store online in just a few days! The AI recommendations were spot on.",author:"Aarav S.",role:"Boutique Owner",rating:5},{quote:"I had no idea where to start, but Revolv guided me with the perfect tools. My business has never been more efficient!",author:"Sophia M.",role:"Café Owner",rating:5},{quote:"The platform is incredibly user-friendly, and the support team is amazing. Highly recommended!",author:"Rajesh K.",role:"Freelancer",rating:4}];const renderStars=rating=>{return[...Array(rating)].map((_,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Star,{size:16,className:"star-icon",fill:"currentColor"},index));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"testimonials",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonials-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"What Our Clients Say"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"testimonial-cards",children:testimonials.map((testimonial,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"testimonial-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Quote,{className:"quote-icon",size:40}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"rating",children:renderStars(testimonial.rating)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"quote-text",children:testimonial.quote}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"author-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h4",{children:testimonial.author}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"author-role",children:testimonial.role})]})]},index))})]})});};export default Testimonials;
